selector.description: The selector to use for selecting entities. It can be the username of a player, the UUID of the entity or a target selector.

bientity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified action will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
